title: Successful user registration
description: Verify that a new user can register successfully with valid input data.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Enter a valid email address, username, and password
Submit the registration form
Confirm that the registration is successful and user is redirected or shown a success message

title: User registration with invalid email format
description: Verify the system rejects registration with an improperly formatted email address.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Enter an invalid email format, e.g., 'useratexample.com'
Fill other required fields with valid data
Submit the registration form
Check that an appropriate error message about invalid email format is displayed and registration is prevented

title: Login success with valid credentials
description: Verify that users can login successfully when providing correct credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid username/email and password
Submit the login form
Verify successful login and redirection to the dashboard or home page

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails and appropriate error is shown when credentials are incorrect.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter incorrect username/email or password
Submit the login form
Confirm failure message is shown, and user remains on login page

title: Password recovery workflow
description: Verify that the password recovery process initiates and completes properly.

steps.description: Navigate to the password recovery page
Enter a registered email address
Submit the recovery request
Verify that a password reset email or link is sent
Use the reset link to set a new password
Verify that password is reset successfully and user can login with the new password

title: Admin Dashboard access control
description: Verify that only authenticated admin users can access the Admin Dashboard and unauthorized access is prevented.

steps.description: Attempt to access the Admin Dashboard URL without logging in
Verify redirection to login page or access denied message
Login as a non-admin user if applicable
Attempt to access the Admin Dashboard again
Verify access is denied or restricted according to permissions
Login as an authorized admin user
Confirm access to Admin Dashboard with all appropriate features visible

title: Admin Dashboard financial data accuracy and realtime update
description: Verify that financial data including daily and monthly sales, cash flow and client subscriptions are shown accurately and update in real time.

steps.description: Log in as an admin user and navigate to the finance section of the dashboard
Verify displayed financial data matches backend data for sales, cash flow and subscriptions
Simulate new order or payment received externally
Verify that financial figures update in real time without page reload

title: Manage menu categories and products CRUD operations
description: Verify the creation, reading, updating and deletion of menu categories and products including image upload with cropping and compression.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to menu management
Create a new product category
Verify the new category is saved and displayed correctly
Add a new product with image upload, use crop and compression features
Verify product and image save correctly and appear in the product list
Edit the product details and images
Confirm changes persist and reflect immediately
Delete a product and category
Verify they are removed from the list and backend data

title: Order management with Kanban drag-and-drop board
description: Verify order statuses can be updated via drag-and-drop on the Kanban board and state changes persist correctly.

steps.description: Login as admin and open order management Kanban board
Drag an order card from 'pending' to 'preparing'
Verify order status updates visually and backend data reflects the new status
Drag the order card across multiple statuses up to 'delivered'
Verify updates complete successfully without lag or errors

title: Customer digital menu browsing and ordering with upsell suggestions
description: Verify customers can browse the product catalog, add products to basket, see upsell suggestions, and proceed to checkout.

steps.description: Navigate to the public digital menu via slug/link
Browse products by categories (snacks, drinks, desserts)
Verify products and categories are displayed correctly
Add multiple items to the shopping cart
Verify cart updates totals including delivery fees correctly
Observe upsell suggestions for added products
Verify upsell suggestions appear relevant and can be added to cart
Proceed to checkout
Verify order summary is accurate before sending order

title: Order checkout via WhatsApp formatted message
description: Verify that checkout sends the customer's order details formatted as a WhatsApp message to the snack bar correctly.

steps.description: Complete adding items in cart and proceed to checkout
Trigger order sending via WhatsApp
Check that WhatsApp opens or launches with a properly formatted message containing order details, customer info, and totals

title: PIX payment processing with AbacatePay integration
description: Verify that payments via PIX through AbacatePay complete successfully with QR code generation and display.

steps.description: Select PIX payment option during checkout
Generate PIX QR code via AbacatePay API
Verify QR code is displayed accurately and is scannable
Simulate payment completion
Verify payment status updates and is confirmed to both customer and admin

title: PIX payment processing with Stripe integration
description: Verify PIX payment completion with Stripe API and correct QR code generation.

steps.description: Select PIX payment via Stripe during checkout
Generate Stripe PIX QR code
Confirm QR code is valid and visible to customer
Simulate successful payment notification from Stripe
Confirm payment success is displayed and order status updated

title: Offline data caching and synchronization for customers
description: Verify the digital menu and order system caches data locally for offline use and automatically synchronizes when connectivity returns.

steps.description: Load the digital menu with network online
Go offline and continue browsing menu and adding items to cart
Verify local cached data is used and user can make orders without errors
Restore internet connectivity
Confirm local order data auto-synchronizes to backend and UI updates accordingly

title: Offline data caching and synchronization for Admin Dashboard
description: Verify that admin users can perform management tasks offline and data syncs properly when online.

steps.description: Log in as admin with network online and load dashboard
Go offline and perform CRUD operations on menu and orders
Verify operations succeed locally with UI updates
Reconnect to internet
Verify all offline changes synchronize with backend without data conflicts

title: Order notifications via WhatsApp integration
description: Verify that order notifications are sent correctly via WhatsApp to the snack bar as formatted messages.

steps.description: Complete an order checkout triggering WhatsApp notification
Verify that order details are sent accurately as a WhatsApp message to the designated phone number

title: Order notifications via Telegram integration
description: Verify that order notifications are sent correctly via Telegram with correct formatting and content.

steps.description: Trigger an order notification to Telegram from the admin or system
Confirm the Telegram message is delivered with full order details and correct formatting

title: QR code generation for physical tables or counters
description: Verify that QR codes can be generated and downloaded for tables/counters enabling easy customer menu access.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to QR code generation section
Generate QR codes for a set of tables or counters
Verify QR codes are generated correctly linking to the respective digital menus
Download or export QR codes
Confirm QR codes are downloadable in expected formats and test scans successfully

title: User and store branding customization
description: Verify that admin users can customize UI branding including colors and logos and these reflect in the app immediately.

steps.description: Login as admin and access store customization settings
Modify brand colors and upload a new logo
Verify that UI elements across menus and dashboard update to reflect the new branding colors and logo
Refresh the app or access from a new browser
Confirm branding settings persist and display correctly

title: Security validation of Row Level Security (RLS) in Supabase
description: Verify that Supabase RLS policies correctly restrict data access to authorized users only.

steps.description: Attempt to access another user's data using API calls or UI as a logged-in user
Verify access is denied or restricted according to RLS policies
Access own data with authorized user
Verify full access to own data without restrictions

title: Real-time order tracking and status update verification
description: Verify that order status updates are reflected instantly on both admin and customer views using Supabase Realtime.

steps.description: Place an order as a customer and observe order status page
Login as admin and update the order status
Verify the customer's order status updates immediately without page refresh

title: UI/UX responsiveness and brand color adaptation on mobile devices
description: Verify the application is fully responsive and adapts brand colors correctly on various mobile screen sizes.

steps.description: Open app on multiple mobile devices and screen resolutions
Confirm layout adjusts properly without breaking or overflow
Verify brand colors and logos appear consistently and correctly across screens

title: Error handling on failed data synchronization during offline mode
description: Verify system behavior and error handling when data synchronization fails after offline usage.

steps.description: Work offline and perform changes
Simulate network connectivity restoration with a synchronization error (e.g., server timeout)
Verify appropriate error message is shown and user can retry synchronization without data loss
